contents.text: Thank you for calling Airbnb in San Francisco, where you can book unique homes and experiences around the globe.
For reservation and booking options, press 1.
To make a new reservation, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a booking specialist.

navigationGoals: Quickly secure a new Airbnb in San Francisco for my upcoming business trip next week
I’d like to reserve a pet-friendly cabin near Yosemite for a weekend getaway.
Initiate a new reservation for a San Francisco loft from July 10 to July 15.
I’d like help making a new reservation for a room in San Francisco for three nights in August.
I’d like to book a new Airbnb in San Francisco for my upcoming research trip next month.

contents.text: To modify or cancel an existing reservation, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your reservation details.

navigationGoals: Modify the dates on my existing San Francisco reservation to fit a change in my travel plans
I need to change the check-in and check-out dates on my upcoming stay.
Extend my existing SF booking by two nights, shifting checkout from July 15 to July 17.
I need to change the dates on my existing reservation from April 20th to April 25th.
I need to adjust the dates on my existing San Francisco reservation to accommodate my exam schedule.

contents.text: For support with hosting or your account, press 2.
If you are a host with questions about your listing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a host support representative.

navigationGoals: Get assistance updating pricing and availability on my Airbnb host listing
I need help updating my listing with accessible parking details.
Configure smart‐lock API credentials on my San Francisco listing.
I’m a host and need assistance setting up my listing and adding photos.
I’m a student host and have questions about optimizing my listing to attract more guests.

contents.text: For account, payment, or technical assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account support team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a payment method issue on my account so I can book immediately
I need to update my credit card information on my account.
Enable two‐factor authentication on my account and resolve the failed email verification loop.
I can’t access my account and need help resetting my password.
I need help updating my payment method on my Airbnb account.
